BasicDescription.Title: Weather View
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Detailed weather forecast.

BasicDescription.Title: Horror Express
BasicDescription.Synopsis: In the early 1900s, an English anthropologist discovers a strange, frozen ape-man in China. But while it is being transported, the creature escapes. Stars Christopher Lee. W/S. [1972]

In the early 1900s, an English anthropologist discovers a strange, frozen ape-man in China. But while it is being transported back to England on board the Trans-Siberian Express, the creature escapes from its crate, beginning a journey of terror for all the passengers.
Stars Christopher Lee, Peter Cushing, Telly Savalas and Alberto De Mendoza. [1972]

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News 24
BasicDescription.Synopsis: BBC ONE joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news, with bulletins on the hour and the headlines every 15 minutes.

BasicDescription.Title: Teletubbies Count To Christmas
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBeebies. The Teletubbies count the days till Christmas.

BasicDescription.Title: Clifford The Big Red Dog
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBeebies. Come Back Mack: Mac tears one of Jetta's favourite sweaters and feels so terrible that he runs away. Clifford and friends seek him out and convince him to return and face the music.

BasicDescription.Title: Arthur
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Sue Ellen Moves In/The Perfect Brother: A new girl has arrived in town and no one knows anything about her. Judging by the strange things happening at her house, no one wants to know.

BasicDescription.Title: Woody Woodpecker
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Woody's Ship Of Ghouls/Bad Hair Day/Downsized Woody: Woody stows away on a pirate ship, Buzz causes chaos at Winnie's hair shop, and Woody is demoted to pigeon.

BasicDescription.Title: Super Duper Sumos
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Eviction Conviction: The Bad Inc boardroom becomes overcrowded with failed monsters and hideous experiments, so they decide to build a new HQ.

BasicDescription.Title: Yvon Of The Yukon
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Realising that his formal education is not up to much, Yvon manages to enroll himself in Tommy's high school. Yvon's quick wit and unusual ways make him the most popular student.

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Little Red Rodent Hood: Granny recounts the story of Red Riding Hood to Timmy mouse, as he falls asleep and dreams that he is Red Riding Hood and Sylvester is Grandma.

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Lovelorn Leghorn/ Mouse Mazurka/ Muzzle Tough: Another classic madcap cartoon, featuring the adventures of crazy characters like Bugs Bunny, Tweety, Sylvester and Road Runner.

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. My Bunny Lies Over The Sea: Tunnelling to Los Angeles, Bugs Bunny tries to find the La Brea Tar Pits. Taking a wrong turn, he finds himself in Scotland.

BasicDescription.Title: The Wild Thornberrys
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Gobi Yourself: Eliza and her Chinese friend Arioka secretly switch places so that Eliza can ride across the desert on camels and Arioka can ride in the Commvee.

BasicDescription.Title: The Saturday Show
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Fearne Cotton and Simon Grant are joined live in the studio by the boys from Busted, all eight of the S-Club Juniors, and the Cheeky Girls. Plus an exclusive update from the Fame Academy.

Fearne Cotton and Simon Grant are joined live in the studio by the boys from Busted, all eight of the S-Club Juniors, and the Cheeky Girls. We also get an exclusive update from the Fame Academy.
Plus games, competitions and great shows - Woody Woodpecker, Fairly Odd Parents and Viva S Club. Add a dash of anarchy from Tiny and Mr Duk, and you have a cracking Saturday Show lineup.
From 11.15am, Top Of The Pops Saturday will have top performances and features from Busted, who will be playing their forthcoming single, Year 3000, and S-Club Juniors with Sleigh Ride. If that wasn't enough, the Cheeky Girls will be taking over the studio, and we have a sneaky look behind the scenes at Zoe Birkett's video shoot.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: National and international news from the BBC.

BasicDescription.Title: Match Of The Day Live
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Rangers v Celtic: Live coverage of the second Old Firm clash of the season, as Ibrox hosts one of the most famous derby matches in the world: Rangers v Celtic.

Live coverage of the second Old Firm clash of the season, as Ibrox hosts one of the most famous derby matches in the world.
The last league meeting between these two sides was a memorable affair, with Chris Sutton's late goal for Celtic salvaging a 3-3 draw in October.
Rangers and Celtic appear once again to be contesting their own private battle for the league title, and victory for either side today would be a big step towards claiming it.

BasicDescription.Title: Rugby Union: Grandstand
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Live Heineken Cup rugby, as Edinburgh and Toulouse resume their European campaign in Pool Five, with commentary from Eddie Butler and Brian Moore.

Live Heineken Cup rugby, as Edinburgh and Toulouse resume their European campaign in Pool Five.
The French side were winners of the inaugural European competition in 1995/96 and currently lead their group with two wins out of two. Edinburgh have impressed with a 27-17 win over Newport in the opening round, and another win this afternoon will put them in a healthy position.
Commentary from Eddie Butler and Brian Moore.

BasicDescription.Title: Final Score
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Two of the favourites for the Premiership title, Manchester United and Arsenal, meet at Old Trafford, while Liverpool will be looking to boost their title challenge away at Charlton.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: National and international news from the BBC.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom. Followed by the national headlines and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Bicentennial Man
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sci-fi drama starring Robin Williams. When the Martins purchase a domestic android, the family members don't yet know that Andrew, their servant, is no ordinary robot. W/S. [1999]

Television premiere of the sci-fi drama starring Robin Williams and Sam Neil.
When the Martins purchase a domestic android, the family members don't yet know that their servant Andrew is no ordinary robot. Soon they discover that their new acquisition is not only capable of emotion and intelligence, but the longer he stays with them, the more strongly these human characteristics manifest themselves. Over the next 20 years, Andrew becomes less a machine and more a member of the family, until one day a scientist tells Andrew that he might be able to turn him into a human being. Having had a taste of what it means to be human, Andrew is unable to resist the offer. [1999]
Andrew ...... Robin Williams Sir ...... Sam Neil Little Miss/Portia ...... Embeth Davidtz Ma'am ...... Wendy Crewson Rupert Burns ...... Oliver Platt Little Miss, age 7 ...... Hallie Kate Eisenberg Dennis Mansky ...... Stephen Root Female President ...... Lynne Thigpen Lloyd ...... Bradley Whitford Galatea ...... Kiersten Warren

BasicDescription.Title: National Lottery Jet Set
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Hosted by Eamonn Holmes. Six contestants pit their wits against each other in a general knowledge quiz, in a bid to win a luxury holiday. Includes Lotto, Lotto Extra and Thunderball.

The quiz show which sends contestants to the most lavish and luxurious destinations on Earth. Hosted by Eamonn Holmes. Six contestants battle out a general knowledge quiz in the studio, trying to win the ultimate lifestyle.
Includes Lotto, Lotto Extra and Thunderball.
If you would like to be a contestant, call 09001 114461 (calls cost a maximum of 60p).

BasicDescription.Title: Casualty
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Blame: Lara encounters problems when the police officer who helped put her in jail, is brought in to the department. A horrific RTA stirs up painful memories for Josh.

Blame
There are problems for Lara when the police officer who helped put her in jail is brought in to the department. A horrific RTA stirs up painful memories for Josh and when he cries off from a charity auction that evening, a furious Colette takes Simon instead. Will Josh pay the ultimate price for putting his work first?

BasicDescription.Title: Daniel Deronda
BasicDescription.Synopsis: As Daniel continues his search for Mirah's family, Gwendolen feels more and more imprisoned in her unhappy marriage to Grandcourt. She begs Daniel not to abandon her, but he has to leave England.

Episode 3.
As Daniel continues his search for Mirah's family, Gwendolen feels more and more imprisoned in her unhappy marriage to Grandcourt. She begs Daniel not to abandon her, but he has to leave England suddenly, after Sir Hugo makes a shattering revelation.
Last in series.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: National and international news from the BBC.

BasicDescription.Title: Sliding Doors
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow and John Hannah. Helen is about to discover that fate can be sealed quickly and that there are two sides to every story. W/S. [1998]

Oscar winner Gwyneth Paltrow and John Hannah star in an inventive romantic comedy.
Helen is about to discover that fate can be sealed as quickly as a pair of Sliding Doors. There are two sides to every story, and Helen is about to live them. Romance has never be quite so duplicitous. [1998]
Helen ...... Gwyneth Paltrow James ...... John Hannah Gerry ...... John Lynch Lydia ...... Jeanne Tripplehorn Anna ...... Zara Turner Russell ...... Douglas McFerran Clive ...... Paul Brightwell Claudia ...... Nina Young James' Mother ...... Virginia McKenna

BasicDescription.Title: Match Of The Day
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Presented by Gary Lineker. Highlights of today's FA Cup 2nd round matches, with a number of non-league clubs dreaming of a Premiership tie in the 3rd round.
